attributes.action: put further education back under local authority control
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since incorporation FE Principals have had carte blanche to award themselves huge pay rises, use nepotism and victimisation to strenghten their position while imposing draconian contracts and workloads on their hard working teaching staff. If FE was put back under the conrol of LEAs there would at least be measures in place to control their excess and to get back to national pay scales and conditions of service for lecturing staff.
